text: Na ba bandi (indyarya) bubatse umusigiti bagamije kugirira nabi (abemeramana), guhakana (Allah), no gucamo ibice abemeramana, (bakanawugira) indiri y’abarwanya Allah n’Intumwa ye na mbere hose (y’uko wubakwa), rwose bazarahira ko nta kindi bari bagambiriye kitari ibyiza. Kandi Allah ahamya ko mu by’ukuri ari abanyabinyoma
